data.name: F1 Race Stars - Science Accessory Pack
data.detailed_description: Download the F1 RACE STARS™ Science Accessory Pack now! Customise your horn sound, skid marks and boost shapes with this new accessory pack bundle. Includes 3 cool themes – Atomic, Space and Maths. Available in single player, split-screen and online.
data.about_the_game: Download the F1 RACE STARS™ Science Accessory Pack now! Customise your horn sound, skid marks and boost shapes with this new accessory pack bundle. Includes 3 cool themes – Atomic, Space and Maths. Available in single player, split-screen and online.
data.short_description: Download the F1 RACE STARS™ Science Accessory Pack now! Customise your horn sound, skid marks and boost shapes with this new accessory pack bundle. Includes 3 cool themes – Atomic, Space and Maths. Available in single player, split-screen and online.
data.supported_languages: English, German, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows Vista / Windows 7 32-Bit
  • Processor:Dual Core 2.0 Ghz Processor or better
  • Memory:2 MB RAM
  • Graphics:DirectX 10 based Graphics Card or better, minimum
  • DirectX®:11
  • Hard Drive:5 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX 9.0c compatible Sound Card or better
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:Windows 7 64-Bit
  • Processor:Quad Core 3.0 Ghz processor or better
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:DirectX 11 based Graphics Card, minimum 512 MB RAM
  • DirectX®:11
  • Hard Drive:5 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX 9.0c compatible Sound Card or better
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
